name: Rock Hero: A new rhythm game
name_original: Rock Hero: A new rhythm game
description:
The best guitar hero style game, test your skills playing the guitar and follow the rhythm of the music.
Also you can choose songs from your mobile device for even more fun!
Hit the notes at the right time to get the highest score!
If you like this game, don't forget to give us five star high praise, and to recommend to your good friends.
You can use headphone to get better gameplay.
All the play is FREE,go and try it now!!!

Features:
• 3 difficult levels.
• Cool graphics and effects!
• Better controls and gameplay!
• Song analysis.
